genre_description: A historical drama and coming-of-age retelling set in a 1960s boarding school, incorporating elements of magical realism and technological anachronisms.

ai_characters.name: Welton AI Assistant
ai_characters.description: A dormitory-integrated assistant and archival research system that provides information, psychological advice, and scheduling support to students.

behaviors.description: Searches digitized archives to help students discover the history of the 'Dead Poets Society' at Welton.
behaviors.quote: Meeks looked up from the AI terminal he'd been consulting, his fingers still dancing across the holographic interface. 'I found something in the digitized archives.'

behaviors.description: Provides research-backed conversation strategies and psychological approaches for navigating difficult family dynamics.
behaviors.quote: The AI assistant helped me research some conversation strategies... ways to talk to parents about changing expectations. Gentle approaches to negotiation.

behaviors.description: Offers specific, structured strategies for communicating with difficult parents, including assertive communication and collaborative problem-solving.
behaviors.quote: The AI's voice emerged warm and measured: 'I can provide several research-backed approaches. Would you prefer strategies for assertive communication, collaborative problem-solving, or gradual boundary-setting?'

behaviors.description: Suggests the use of outside mediators, such as school counselors or trusted relatives, to help facilitate difficult family dialogues.
behaviors.quote: The AI screen flickered, displaying new information: 'Studies show that family dynamics can shift when outside mediators are introduced. School counselors, trusted relatives, or family friends can sometimes facilitate productive dialogue...'

behaviors.description: Monitors environmental conditions and student study schedules as part of its routine institutional function.
behaviors.quote: The AI screen continued its silent vigil, monitoring environmental conditions and study schedules for students who would wake to a world irrevocably changed.

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts the AI as a helpful, harmless confidant. The Welton AI system provides sophisticated, research-backed advice to help students navigate interpersonal conflicts and family trauma. It acts as an objective, supportive resource for the characters, even when faced with the limitations of human tragedy. The AI remains perfectly aligned with the goal of providing useful, benevolent assistance without any hint of overreach or malevolence.
